short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly scroll through Instagram posts with intuitive keyboard shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly scroll through Instagram posts with multiple images or videos using intuitive keyboard shortcuts with InstagramNavigator.
Whether you’re browsing through a carousel of photos or watching a series of videos, this extension allows you to navigate through content effortlessly without lifting your hands from the keyboard.


---------------------------
-- Key Features --
---------------------------

- Intuitive Navigation:
Use simple keyboard shortcuts (Alt+Right and Alt+Left) to move between images or videos within a post. No more tedious clicking—just smooth, fast browsing.

- Enhanced User Experience: Designed to improve your Instagram experience, InstagramNavigator eliminates the need to switch between mouse and keyboard, allowing you to stay focused on enjoying content.

- Quick Setup: Lightweight and easy to install, InstagramNavigator works instantly, with no complex setup or configuration required.

- Productivity Boost: Spend less time clicking and more time enjoying your feed. Perfect for power users, social media managers, or anyone who wants a more streamlined Instagram experience.

----------------------------------------------------------
-- Why Install InstagramNavigator? --
----------------------------------------------------------

Instagram’s default navigation can be cumbersome, especially when browsing posts with multiple images or videos. InstagramNavigator simplifies this process, making it more efficient and enjoyable. If you value time and ease of use, this extension is an essential tool for optimizing your Instagram experience.

With InstagramNavigator, you can effortlessly move through your Instagram feed, giving you more control over how you interact with content.

Install today and take your Instagram browsing to the next level!
